price: Basi mcheni Mwenyezi Mungu, na nit'iini.
footnotes: Mwogopeni Mwenyezi Mungu katika kutumia nguvu, Na fuateni amri yangu katika ninayo kuitieni. Kwani hayo hakika ndiyo yatakayo kukufaeni na ndiyo yatakayo dumu zaidi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
